mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.carrier_code AS "carrierCode", a.group_code AS "groupCode", a.max_weight AS "maxWeight", a.max_volume AS "maxVolume", a.max_cost AS "maxCost", a.data_set AS "dataSet", a.owner_code AS "ownerCode", scds.name AS "dataSetName", a.owner_code AS "oldOwnerCode", a.carrier_code AS "oldCarrierCode", a.group_code AS "oldGroupCode"
LEFT JOIN sys_common_data_set scds ON a.data_set = scds.code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_oms_carrier_service_scope( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, carrier_code, group_code, max_weight, max_volume, max_cost, data_set, owner_code ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{carrierCode}, #{groupCode}, #{maxWeight}, #{maxVolume}, #{maxCost}, #{dataSet}, #{ownerCode} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_oms_carrier_service_scope SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, carrier_code = #{carrierCode}, group_code = #{groupCode}, max_weight = #{maxWeight}, max_volume = #{maxVolume}, max_cost = #{maxCost}, data_set = #{dataSet}, owner_code = #{ownerCode} WHERE id = #{id}
